verses.verse: <S%G1063>"For<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>Heaven<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> who was the <S%G3617>master<s%> of a <S%G3748>household,<s%> who went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G260>early<s%> in the <S%G4404>morning<s%> to <S%G3409>hire<s%> <S%G2040>laborers<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G290>vineyard.<s%>

<S%G1161>When<s%> he had <S%G4856>agreed<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G2040>laborers<s%> <S%G1537>for<s%> a <S%G1220>denarius<s%> a <S%G2250>day,<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G290>vineyard.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G5610>the<s%> <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> and <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G692>idle<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G58>marketplace.<s%>

<S%G2548>To<s%> <S%G2036>them<s%> he <S%G5210>said,<s%> 'You <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G290>vineyard,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G5600>is<s%> <S%G1342>right<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5213>you.<s%>' <S%G1161>So<s%> they went their <S%G565>way.<s%>

<S%G3825>Again<s%> he went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G5610>the<s%> <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1766>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> and <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G5615>likewise.<s%>

<S%G4012>About<s%> <S%G5610>the<s%> <S%G1734>eleventh<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> he went <S%G1831>out,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G692>idle.<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5101><s%> 'Why do <S%G2476>you<s%> stand <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G692>idle?<s%>'

"They <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3754><s%> 'Because no <S%G3762>one<s%> has <S%G3409>hired<s%> <S%G2248>us.<s%>' "He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5210><s%> 'You <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G290>vineyard,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> will <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G5600>is<s%> <S%G1342>right.<s%>'

<S%G1096>When<s%> <S%G3798>evening<s%> had <S%G1096>come,<s%> the <S%G2962>lord<s%> of the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G2012>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2012>manager,<s%> <S%G2564><s%> 'Call the <S%G2040>laborers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2532>pay<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> their <S%G3408>wages,<s%> <S%G756>beginning<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> the <S%G4413>first.<s%>'

<S%G2532>"When<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who were hired at <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G5610>the<s%> <S%G1734>eleventh<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> they <S%G303>each<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> a <S%G1220>denarius.<s%>

<S%G2064>When<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> they <S%G3543>supposed<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they would <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G4119>more;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G2532>likewise<s%> <S%G303>each<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> a <S%G1220>denarius.<s%>
<S%G1161>When<s%> they <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G1111>it,<s%> they murmured <S%G2596>against<s%> the master of the <S%G3617>household,<s%>

<S%G3754>saying,<s%> <S%G3778><s%> 'These <S%G2078>last<s%> have <S%G4160>spent<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> you have <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2470>equal<s%> to <S%G2254>us,<s%> who have <S%G941>borne<s%> the <S%G922>burden<s%> of the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the scorching <S%G2742>heat!<s%>'

<S%G1161>"But<s%> he <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2083><s%> 'Friend, I am <S%G91>doing<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G91>wrong.<s%> <S%G3780>Didn't<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G4856>agree<s%> with <S%G3427>me<s%> for a <S%G1220>denarius?<s%>

<S%G142>Take<s%> that which is <S%G4674>yours,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> go your <S%G5217>way.<s%> It is my <S%G2309>desire<s%> <S%G1161>to<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G2078>to<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2532>just<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> much as to <S%G4671>you.<s%>

<S%G3756>Isn't<s%> <S%G1832>it<s%> <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for <S%G3427>me<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G2309>want<s%> to <S%G1722>with<s%> what I <S%G1487>own?<s%> Or <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3788>eye<s%> <S%G4190>evil,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G18>good?<s%>'

<S%G3779>So<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G4413>first,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2078>last.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G2822>called,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3641>few<s%> are <S%G1588>chosen.<s%>"

As <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was going <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> he <S%G3880>took<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2532>aside,<s%> and on the <S%G3598>way<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%>

<S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> we are going <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> will be <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they will <S%G2632>condemn<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G2288>death,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G3860>hand<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> over to the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1702>mock,<s%> <S%G2532>to<s%> <S%G3146>scourge,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G4717>crucify;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2250>the<s%> <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> he will be raised <S%G450>up.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G5207>of<s%> the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5207>sons,<s%> <S%G4352>kneeling<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G154>asking<s%> a certain <S%G5100>thing<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

He <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> do <S%G2309>you<s%> <S%G3004>want?<s%>" She said to <S%G846>him,<s%> "Command <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3778>these,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5207>sons,<s%> may <S%G2523>sit,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> right <S%G1188>hand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2176>left<s%> <S%G1188>hand,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G932>Kingdom.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "You <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you are <S%G154>asking.<s%> Are you <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%> the <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3195>am<s%> about to <S%G4095>drink,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G907>baptized<s%> with the <S%G908>baptism<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am baptized <S%G907>with?<s%>" They <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> "We are <S%G1410>able.<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> "You will <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4221>cup,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G907>baptized<s%> with the <S%G908>baptism<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am baptized <S%G907>with,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> to <S%G2523>sit<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> right <S%G1188>hand<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2176>left<s%> hand <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3450>mine<s%> to <S%G1325>give;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> it is for <S%G3739>whom<s%> it has been <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father.<s%>"
<S%G191>When<s%> the <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G23>it,<s%> they were indignant <S%G4012>with<s%> the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G80>brothers.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4341>summoned<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> "You <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G758>rulers<s%> of the <S%G1484>nations<s%> lord it <S%G2634>over<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> their <S%G3173>great<s%> ones exercise authority <S%G2715>over<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

It <S%G2071>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3739>whoever<s%> desires to <S%G2309>become<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> shall <S%G2309>be<s%> <S%G5213>your<s%> <S%G1249>servant.<s%>
<S%G3739>Whoever<s%> <S%G2309>desires<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> shall <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G5213>your<s%> <S%G1401>bondservant,<s%>

even <S%G5618>as<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to be <S%G1247>served,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> to <S%G1247>serve,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> as a <S%G3083>ransom<s%> <S%G473>for<s%> <S%G4183>many.<s%>"

<S%G1607>As<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1607>went<s%> <S%G1607>out<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2410>Jericho,<s%> <S%G3793>a<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> blind <S%G5185>men<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G3844>by<s%> the <S%G3598>road,<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was passing <S%G3855>by,<s%> cried <S%G2896>out,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> have mercy <S%G1653>on<s%> <S%G2248>us,<s%> you <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David!<s%>"

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> telling <S%G2443>them<s%> that they should be <S%G4623>quiet,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> they <S%G2896>cried<s%> out even <S%G3185>more,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> have mercy <S%G1653>on<s%> <S%G2248>us,<s%> you <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David!<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> stood <S%G2476>still,<s%> and <S%G5455>called<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>asked,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> do <S%G2309>you<s%> want me to <S%G4160>do<s%> for <S%G2309>you?<s%>"
They <S%G3004>told<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> may be <S%G455>opened.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> being moved with <S%G4697>compassion,<s%> <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> received <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G308>sight,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>
